about_the_game:
This game is a comedic dialogue-centered mystery adventure game. Players will delve into the mysteries of a small town alongside delightful characters as an assistant to a unconventional detective! The game features comical exchanges with unique characters and a slightly poignant story.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:


  • Unique Characters: Meet comical characters and enjoy interacting with them.
  • Simple Puzzles: Progress through the story with easy puzzles enjoyable for everyone.
  • Humorous Story: Experience a story filled with humor and a touch of poignancy.
  • Collectibles: Obtain "Four-Leaf Clovers" scattered throughout to enjoy special stories! What happens when you collect them all...?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Characters:


Kazuya Mikage
The protagonist of the game. His planned employer goes bankrupt! He heads to the "Utsugi Detective Agency" relying on his grandfather's letter to be hired as an assistant detective.


Chiho Utsugi
The head of the Soraki Detective Agency, she's still inexperienced and often referred to as the "Lost Detective" She hires Kazuya as an assistant because she knew Kazuya's grandfather. Outside of her detective work, she's a high school student who has a deep love for plants.


Kyosuke Yamato
The ace of the Soraki Detective Agency. Chiho's guardian and the mainstay supporting the detective agency. He loves black coffee.


Rei Shirouma
A high school student and also the president of Shirouma Company, managing detective work as well. He harbors a competitive spirit against Chiho.


Saki Takamine
A maid serving the Shirouma family, exclusively for Rei-sama. While she smiles gently, she also takes care of Rei firmly without spoiling him.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Information

Title: Assistant to the Lost Detective - Remaster -
Genre: Adventure Game
Tool: RPG Maker MZ
Estimated Playtime: Approximately 1 to 3 hours (Each episode: 10 minutes~)
Number of Episodes: Total of 9 chapters + Happy End
Number of Endings: 1

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

short_description: A novel-style mystery adventure game. Explore 2D top-down maps! Enjoy easy puzzles and comical text. Become the assistant to the lost detective Chiho-chan and help solve mysteries!
